questions.question: Is the title "Parisian Park Etiquette" visible and clearly displayed in the edited image?
questions.explanation: In Image B, the title visible on the left side of the infographic is 'Parian Park Etiquette', not 'Parisian Park Etiquette'. The title is displayed prominently and clearly, but it differs from 'Parisian'. This typo is evident upon inspection, as the text does not include the letter 's'.

questions.question: Is the infographic layout split vertically, with the pathway acting as a central dividing line?
questions.explanation: Image B shows an infographic split vertically into two sections, but the pathway does not act as a central dividing line. Instead, the pathway is part of the left panel illustration and does not serve as a divider between two halves.

questions.question: Are there stylized seating icons present alongside figures who are depicted as sitting in the "Relax" section?
questions.explanation: In Image B, the 'Relax' section of the infographic depicts silhouettes of people seated, but there are no additional stylized icons representing seating beside them. The image solely focuses on the human figures and does not include other icons or representations of seats.

questions.question: Are there speech bubble graphics connected by lines to walking figures in the "Engage" section?
questions.explanation: In Image B, the 'Engage' section is represented in the left panel where speech bubble graphics are indeed present, but they are not connected by lines to walking figures. The speech bubbles are placed near seated silhouette figures instead.

questions.question: Is there a camera icon in the "Capture" section that includes a depiction of the Eiffel Tower within its design?
questions.explanation: Upon reviewing Image B, the 'Capture' section does include a camera icon, but this icon does not contain a depiction of the Eiffel Tower within its design; rather, the Eiffel Tower is shown separately as an individual icon beside the camera.

questions.question: Are the dominant colors in the infographic cool greens, and are the human figures represented as stylized silhouettes?
questions.explanation: Image B primarily uses shades of green as the dominant colors in its design. Additionally, the human figures are represented as stylized silhouettes in the infographic, enhancing its visual presentation with minimalist, simple shapes.

questions.question: Is the text in the infographic presented in clean, elegant typography without cluttered or ornate styling?
questions.explanation: The typography in Image B is clean and straightforward. The text is presented clearly and legibly, avoiding cluttered or ornate styling, thus providing an elegant and simple visual appeal that matches the infographic style.
